（ええぇ……この子の体力、

engChrName: (Hang in there, champ. It's a marathon, not a sprint.)
engSearchText: (Hang in there, champ. It's a marathon, not a sprint.)
jpnChrName: （ま、頑張れチャンピオン。   チェッカーフラッグはまだ遠そうだがな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、頑張れチャンピオン。
チェッカーフラッグはまだ遠そうだがな。）

engChrName: Out of all the RG guys covering the new weapon promo, I dare say I got the best shot! Heh heh.
engSearchText:
Out of all the RG guys covering the new weapon
promo, I dare say I got the best shot! Heh heh.
jpnChrName: ふふん、新兵器の発表をこんなに間近で 撮れたＲＧの記者は僕だけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふん、新兵器の発表をこんなに間近で
撮れたＲＧの記者は僕だけだ。

engChrName: I knew skipping the Oración cathedral reporting was the right call. Daddy's gonna be over the moon!
engSearchText:
I knew skipping the Oración cathedral reporting was
the right call. Daddy's gonna be over the moon!
jpnChrName: オラシオン大聖堂の取材を蹴ってこっちに 来てみて正解だった、きっとパパも喜ぶ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン大聖堂の取材を蹴ってこっちに
来てみて正解だった、きっとパパも喜ぶ。

engChrName: Still a bit miffed about what happened last time I was out there... I really made a mess of things, somehow.
engSearchText:
Still a bit miffed about what happened last time I was
out there... I really made a mess of things, somehow.
jpnChrName: ……この前のオラシオンでは、知らない間に とんでもない事をしてしまったみたいだしな。
jpnSearchText:
……この前のオラシオンでは、知らない間に
とんでもない事をしてしまったみたいだしな。

engChrName: So I'm hoping I can cover up that little sore spot with a nice haul today!
engSearchText:
So I'm hoping I can cover up that little sore spot with
a nice haul today!
jpnChrName: ここらで堅実な成果を納めてキャリアの 軌道修正と行こうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
ここらで堅実な成果を納めてキャリアの
軌道修正と行こうじゃないか。

engChrName: ...Wait. I just realized, that means the Oración scoop went to HER. Greeeat...
engSearchText:
...Wait. I just realized, that means the Oración scoop
went to HER. Greeeat...
jpnChrName: とはいえ……あのオラシオンのスクープ記事、 あのお騒がせな娘が書いたのか……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……あのオラシオンのスクープ記事、
あのお騒がせな娘が書いたのか……

engChrName: Eh, whatever. I guess I can't complain—I grew up in Oración, and I still dropped the ball that time. Probably good that she covered me.
engSearchText:
Eh, whatever. I guess I can't complain—I grew up in
Oración, and I still dropped the ball that time.
Probably good that she covered me.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、オラシオンに根を下ろした僕らに 出来なかった事を果たしたのは誉めてやろう。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、オラシオンに根を下ろした僕らに
出来なかった事を果たしたのは誉めてやろう。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, I've got good leverage with this pic... Maybe I should hit up the Tyrell Times for a little information exchange.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, I've got good leverage with
this pic... Maybe I should hit up the Tyrell Times for
a little information exchange.
jpnChrName: そうだな……情報交換もしたいし、 折を見てタイレル通信に表敬訪問するか。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……情報交換もしたいし、
折を見てタイレル通信に表敬訪問するか。

engChrName: Heya! Came over from Basel this year. Wanted to be a part of the festival myself, y'know?
engSearchText:
Heya! Came over from Basel this year. Wanted to be
a part of the festival myself, y'know?
jpnChrName: やあ、今年はバーゼルから来てみたよ。 今年は記念祭に乗りたい気分だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
やあ、今年はバーゼルから来てみたよ。
今年は記念祭に乗りたい気分だったんだ。

engChrName: We went through a lot this year... Reaching the end of it feels like a relief. Now we get to start fresh, yeah?
engSearchText:
We went through a lot this year... Reaching the end
of it feels like a relief. Now we get to start fresh, yeah?
jpnChrName: まあ、地元でもあんな事があった年の終わりだしね、 やっぱり乗り越えられた事を一層祝いたいかな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、地元でもあんな事があった年の終わりだしね、
やっぱり乗り越えられた事を一層祝いたいかな。

engChrName: I heard a lotta regulars at my truck are coming, too. Maybe I'll run into them here!
engSearchText:
I heard a lotta regulars at my truck are coming, too.
Maybe I'll run into them here!
jpnChrName: 常連さんの学者先生も来ているらしいし、 せっかくだから会えたら嬉しいな。
jpnSearchText:
常連さんの学者先生も来ているらしいし、
せっかくだから会えたら嬉しいな。

engChrName: Haha! They said this would be bigger than the Film Festival, and they weren't lying!
engSearchText:
Haha! They said this would be bigger than the Film
Festival, and they weren't lying!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、映画祭以上の祭りだってんなら あっしが来ない手は無いですわ！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、映画祭以上の祭りだってんなら
あっしが来ない手は無いですわ！

engChrName: I dare say this keeps pace with even the Principality's celebrations!
engSearchText:
I dare say this keeps pace with even the
Principality's celebrations!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、これが今年の記念祭ですかい。 公国の祭事と比べても盛大なもんですなァ！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、これが今年の記念祭ですかい。
公国の祭事と比べても盛大なもんですなァ！

engChrName: The thing with these big events is, you need lots of energy to go the whole day. Eat up on meat so you can get down, I say!
engSearchText:
The thing with these big events is, you need lots of
energy to go the whole day. Eat up on meat so you
can get down, I say!
jpnChrName: ま、こんなお祭りなら皆体力も使うでしょ？ ささ、肉食べて元気つけてきましょうや！
jpnSearchText:
ま、こんなお祭りなら皆体力も使うでしょ？
ささ、肉食べて元気つけてきましょうや！

engChrName: First District, Vantail
engSearchText: First District, Vantail

jpnSearchText: 首都イーディス一区　ヴァンタイユ地区

engSearchText:

jpnSearchText:

engChrName: December 3rd, 1208, 9:53AM
engSearchText: December 3rd, 1208, 9:53AM

engSearchText:
First District

jpnChrName: 首都イーディス一区── ヴァンタイユ地区　革命記念広場
jpnSearchText:
首都イーディス一区──
ヴァンタイユ地区　革命記念広場

engChrName: To the people of Edith, as well as everyone who lives in this great nation...
engSearchText:
To the people of Edith, as well as everyone who lives
in this great nation...
jpnChrName: ──親愛なるイーディス市民、 並びにカルバード全国民の皆さん。
jpnSearchText:
──親愛なるイーディス市民、
並びにカルバード全国民の皆さん。

engChrName: ...I wish to thank you for gathering here today. I am Roy Gramheart.
engSearchText:
...I wish to thank you for gathering here today. I am
Roy Gramheart.
jpnChrName: ごきげんよう、ロイ・グラムハートです。
jpnSearchText: ごきげんよう、ロイ・グラムハートです。

engChrName: On this very day 108 years ago, in the year 1100 of the Septian Calendar, our ancestors made a choice. A truly remarkable choice.
engSearchText:
On this very day 108 years ago, in the year 1100 of
the Septian Calendar, our ancestors made a choice.
A truly remarkable choice.
jpnChrName: 今から１０８年前──七耀暦１１００年に その偉大な一歩は踏み出されました。
jpnSearchText:
今から１０８年前──七耀暦１１００年に
その偉大な一歩は踏み出されました。

engChrName: They chose to embrace equality, freedom, and love. They chose to stand against discrimination based on class and race.
engSearchText:
They chose to embrace equality, freedom, and love.
They chose to stand against discrimination based on
class and race.
jpnChrName: 自由・平等・友愛の精神のもと 身分や人種による差別を永遠に否定し……
jpnSearchText:
自由・平等・友愛の精神のもと
身分や人種による差別を永遠に否定し……

engChrName: They chose to walk the long road ahead of them to build a utopia of peace.
engSearchText:
They chose to walk the long road ahead of them to
build a utopia of peace.
jpnChrName: 強い意志をもって共に支え合い、 理想郷を築き上げるための長い旅路を。
jpnSearchText:
強い意志をもって共に支え合い、
理想郷を築き上げるための長い旅路を。

engChrName: And that long, winding road was the Calvardian Democratic Revolution...
engSearchText:
And that long, winding road was the Calvardian
Democratic Revolution...
jpnChrName: 《カルバード民主革命》！ それこそが、見果てぬ旅路の名前です。
jpnSearchText:
《カルバード民主革命》！
それこそが、見果てぬ旅路の名前です。

engChrName: ...which changed the face of our country—and the whole world—forever.
engSearchText:
...which changed the face of our country—and the
whole world—forever.
jpnChrName: それがもたらした理念と精神によって 我々は国を、世界を変えてきました。
jpnSearchText:
それがもたらした理念と精神によって
我々は国を、世界を変えてきました。

engChrName: As both a fellow Calvardian and your 23rd president...
engSearchText:
As both a fellow Calvardian and your
23rd president...
jpnChrName: 一国民として、第二十三代大統領として！
jpnSearchText: 一国民として、第二十三代大統領として！

engChrName: ...I am forever grateful to the Goddess above for the honor—the deep, profound honor—to be able to walk this road with you now.
engSearchText:
...I am forever grateful to the Goddess above for the
honor—the deep, profound honor—to be able to
walk this road with you now.
jpnChrName: その旅路を皆さんと共に歩める幸運、 唯々（ただただ）、女神に感謝せざるを得ません！
jpnSearchText:
その旅路を皆さんと共に歩める幸運、
唯々（ただただ）、女神に感謝せざるを得ません！

engChrName: However, though I would love to proclaim this as a day of celebration alone, I, alas, cannot.
engSearchText:
However, though I would love to proclaim this as a
day of celebration alone, I, alas, cannot.
jpnChrName: ……ですが今回は、皆さんと喜びを 分かち合うだけでは済まなくなりました。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが今回は、皆さんと喜びを
分かち合うだけでは済まなくなりました。

engChrName: For as we all know, our brothers and sisters from Creil Village were taken from us at the hands of cowardly terrorists.
engSearchText:
For as we all know, our brothers and sisters from
Creil Village were taken from us at the hands of
cowardly terrorists.
jpnChrName: ご存じのように、卑劣なテロにより 喪われてしまったクレイユ村──
jpnSearchText:
ご存じのように、卑劣なテロにより
喪われてしまったクレイユ村──

engChrName: The people of Creil shared our ideals and dreams. We walked the same path hand in hand, but they were cruelly ripped from our grasp...
engSearchText:
The people of Creil shared our ideals and dreams.
We walked the same path hand in hand, but they
were cruelly ripped from our grasp...
jpnChrName: 共に歩み、夢と理想を共有していた 同志たちが犠牲となってしまったからです。
jpnSearchText:
共に歩み、夢と理想を共有していた
同志たちが犠牲となってしまったからです。

engChrName: Despite this great loss, we moved forward, and all of you cooperated with the recent emergency declaration.
engSearchText:
Despite this great loss, we moved forward, and all of
you cooperated with the recent
emergency declaration.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言への皆さんの協力もあり……
jpnSearchText: 非常事態宣言への皆さんの協力もあり……

engChrName: Thanks in no small part to your assistance, we were able to eliminate the criminal organization that was responsible for this heinous act.
engSearchText:
Thanks in no small part to your assistance, we were
able to eliminate the criminal organization that was
responsible for this heinous act.
jpnChrName: テロを企てた残虐なる犯罪組織については 完膚無きまでに壊滅することが出来ました。
jpnSearchText:
テロを企てた残虐なる犯罪組織については
完膚無きまでに壊滅することが出来ました。

engChrName: Though I realize that will never bring back the lives that have been lost.
engSearchText:
Though I realize that will never bring back the lives
that have been lost.
jpnChrName: ですが逝ってしまった方々は戻ってこない──
jpnSearchText: ですが逝ってしまった方々は戻ってこない──

engChrName: As this country's commander in chief, I am deeply ashamed that I let such a tragedy happen under my watch.
engSearchText:
As this country's commander in chief, I am deeply
ashamed that I let such a tragedy happen under
my watch.
jpnChrName: 国を預かる者として、最高司令官として まこと慚愧（ざんき）に堪えません。
jpnSearchText:
国を預かる者として、最高司令官として
まこと慚愧（ざんき）に堪えません。

engChrName: Let us mourn the people of Creil. I will lead us in prayer.
engSearchText:
Let us mourn the people of Creil. I will lead us
in prayer.
jpnChrName: お悔やみの言葉を述べるとともに これより追悼の儀を執り行わせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
お悔やみの言葉を述べるとともに
これより追悼の儀を執り行わせて頂きます。

engChrName: Oh, Aidios... Arusha... Heavenly Mother...
engSearchText: Oh, Aidios... Arusha... Heavenly Mother...
jpnChrName: 天にまします空の女神（エイドス）よ、 翼の女神（アルーシャ）よ、天上聖母よ。
jpnSearchText:
天にまします空の女神（エイドス）よ、
翼の女神（アルーシャ）よ、天上聖母よ。

engChrName: We pray that you will watch over these lost souls— and return them to the radiant land.
engSearchText:
We pray that you will watch over these lost souls—
and return them to the radiant land.
jpnChrName: 願わくば彼らを導き、 光射す大地へと還したまえ──
jpnSearchText:
願わくば彼らを導き、
光射す大地へと還したまえ──

engChrName: That was a wonderful ceremony. Thank you, Archbishop. And I thank the ladies and gentlemen of the choir as well.
engSearchText:
That was a wonderful ceremony. Thank
you, Archbishop. And I thank the ladies and
gentlemen of the choir as well.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございました、大司教猊下。 そして聖歌隊の諸君。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございました、大司教猊下。
そして聖歌隊の諸君。

engChrName: The road to success is paved with hardship—and the road this nation has walked has not been without its challenges.
engSearchText:
The road to success is paved with hardship—and the
road this nation has walked has not been without
its challenges.
jpnChrName: ──思えばこの長き旅路の中、 多くの苦難と混乱がありました。
jpnSearchText:
──思えばこの長き旅路の中、
多くの苦難と混乱がありました。

engChrName: Those challenges include our longstanding conflict with the Empire, the economic crises of recent years...
engSearchText:
Those challenges include our longstanding conflict
with the Empire, the economic crises of
recent years...
jpnChrName: 帝国との長きにわたる紛争、 幾度となく訪れた経済恐慌……
jpnSearchText:
帝国との長きにわたる紛争、
幾度となく訪れた経済恐慌……

engChrName: ...and even that wretched cult that existed in our country until ten years prior.
engSearchText:
...and even that wretched cult that existed in our
country until ten years prior.
jpnChrName: 今回のマフィアの暴虐のみならず、 邪悪な宗教団体の事件もありました。
jpnSearchText:
今回のマフィアの暴虐のみならず、
邪悪な宗教団体の事件もありました。

engChrName: And there are challenges that lie ahead, including the terrorism that has infested our nation and the discrimination that is outlawed in our charter.
engSearchText:
And there are challenges that lie ahead, including the
terrorism that has infested our nation and the
discrimination that is outlawed in our charter.
jpnChrName: そして未だに、共和国憲章に反する差別や、 テロリズムの温床は残っており……
jpnSearchText:
そして未だに、共和国憲章に反する差別や、
テロリズムの温床は残っており……

engChrName: If we glance outside our borders, we will notice that the seeds of war are being planted...
engSearchText:
If we glance outside our borders, we will notice that
the seeds of war are being planted...
jpnChrName: 国外に目を向ければ、紛争の火種は絶えず、 帝国が更生できるのかも不透明な状況です。
jpnSearchText:
国外に目を向ければ、紛争の火種は絶えず、
帝国が更生できるのかも不透明な状況です。

engChrName: ...and if we look beyond the horizon, we will see that the desertification in the East is creeping westward.
engSearchText:
...and if we look beyond the horizon, we will see that
the desertification in the East is creeping westward.
jpnChrName: さらに共和国の東、不毛の荒野が 広がり続けている大陸東部にも──
jpnSearchText:
さらに共和国の東、不毛の荒野が
広がり続けている大陸東部にも──

engChrName: Open your eyes. These problems can be ignored no longer. We, as the leading power on the continent, must face them—and overcome them.
engSearchText:
Open your eyes. These problems can be ignored
no longer. We, as the leading power on the continent,
must face them—and overcome them.
jpnChrName: ゼムリア大陸を主導する我が国は いずれ目を向けざるを得ないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ゼムリア大陸を主導する我が国は
いずれ目を向けざるを得ないでしょう。

engChrName: Take the founders of our revolution, for instance. They confronted their challenges head on and actualized their ambitions.
engSearchText:
Take the founders of our revolution, for instance.
They confronted their challenges head on and
actualized their ambitions.
jpnChrName: そして革命の母シーナ・ディルクが、 思想家オーギュストが、芸術家アラミスが。
jpnSearchText:
そして革命の母シーナ・ディルクが、
思想家オーギュストが、芸術家アラミスが。

engChrName: Sheena Dirke, Auguste Aldan, Aramis Gainsbourg, and Ulgar Atkinson surmounted every obstacle that barred their way—and we will do the same.
engSearchText:
Sheena Dirke, Auguste Aldan, Aramis Gainsbourg,
and Ulgar Atkinson surmounted every obstacle that
barred their way—and we will do the same.
jpnChrName: アトキンソン将軍が多くの困難を乗り越え、 革命の敵を打ち倒してきたように──
jpnSearchText:
アトキンソン将軍が多くの困難を乗り越え、
革命の敵を打ち倒してきたように──

engChrName: We must stand united as we move into tomorrow as one...
engSearchText:
We must stand united as we move into tomorrow
as one...
jpnChrName: 我々もまた、一致団結して前に進むため、 “強く”在り続けなければなりません。
jpnSearchText:
我々もまた、一致団結して前に進むため、
“強く”在り続けなければなりません。

engChrName: ...but to forge a path ahead, we need not only strength of will—but also strength of arms.
engSearchText:
...but to forge a path ahead, we need not only
strength of will—but also strength of arms.
jpnChrName: それを可能にする力を、本日この場で 皆さんに披露させていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
それを可能にする力を、本日この場で
皆さんに披露させていただきます。

engChrName: That brings me to today's big announcement. We have given our glorious Calvardian military a number of much-needed improvements.
engSearchText:
That brings me to today's big announcement.
We have given our glorious Calvardian military a
number of much-needed improvements.
jpnChrName: ご紹介しましょう、現在大規模な刷新が 進んでいる共和国軍の《次世代兵装》──
jpnSearchText:
ご紹介しましょう、現在大規模な刷新が
進んでいる共和国軍の《次世代兵装》──

engChrName: Allow me to unveil the future!
engSearchText: Allow me to unveil the future!
jpnChrName: その“一端”を！
jpnSearchText: その“一端”を！

engChrName: First, we have our next-generation Schedar tanks. They will replace our antiquated Wezen models.
engSearchText:
First, we have our next-generation Schedar tanks.
They will replace our antiquated Wezen models.
jpnChrName: まずは現主力戦車《ウェズン》に代わる、 次世代戦車となる《シェダル》シリーズです。
jpnSearchText:
まずは現主力戦車《ウェズン》に代わる、
次世代戦車となる《シェダル》シリーズです。

engChrName: These tanks will leave the ones used in the Empire firmly in the dust. They are twice as fast—and equally as durable.
engSearchText:
These tanks will leave the ones used in the Empire
firmly in the dust. They are twice as fast—and equally
as durable.
jpnChrName: 帝国の主力戦車の２倍の最高速度を 実現しつつも防御性能はそれに匹敵──
jpnSearchText:
帝国の主力戦車の２倍の最高速度を
実現しつつも防御性能はそれに匹敵──

engChrName: The main cannon's raw power measures up to theirs, and they are capable of firing nearly three times the distance.
engSearchText:
The main cannon's raw power measures up to theirs,
and they are capable of firing nearly three times
the distance.
jpnChrName: 同クラスの口径を持つ主砲に至っては ３倍近くとなる射程距離を実現しました。
jpnSearchText:
同クラスの口径を持つ主砲に至っては
３倍近くとなる射程距離を実現しました。

engChrName: Next, we have an entirely new addition to our military—the Ix-Alba series of aerial cruisers.
engSearchText:
Next, we have an entirely new addition to our
military—the Ix-Alba series of aerial cruisers.
jpnChrName: 続けて共和国軍初となる飛行巡洋艦、 《イクス＝アルバ》級です。
jpnSearchText:
続けて共和国軍初となる飛行巡洋艦、
《イクス＝アルバ》級です。

engChrName: They are 120 arge long, which places them between our battleships and mid-sized airships in size.
engSearchText:
They are 120 arge long, which places them between
our battleships and mid-sized airships in size.
jpnChrName: 全長１２０アージュという、飛行戦艦と 中型飛行艦の間に位置するクラスですが……
jpnSearchText:
全長１２０アージュという、飛行戦艦と
中型飛行艦の間に位置するクラスですが……

engChrName: They are equipped with highly advanced weaponry, and their cutting-edge control systems allow them to conduct operations with complete autonomy.
engSearchText:
They are equipped with highly advanced weaponry,
and their cutting-edge control systems allow them to
conduct operations with complete autonomy.
jpnChrName: 最新の武装に加え、高性能の管制システムを備え、 一艦で独立した作戦行動を可能としています。
jpnSearchText:
最新の武装に加え、高性能の管制システムを備え、
一艦で独立した作戦行動を可能としています。

engChrName: Based on our recent field tests, we have concluded that even one of these cruisers can dominate an entire squadron of Imperial airships.
engSearchText:
Based on our recent field tests, we have concluded
that even one of these cruisers can dominate an entire
squadron of Imperial airships.
jpnChrName: 最新の模擬演習では、一艦で帝国の飛行分艦隊を 圧倒できるほどの戦力評価を得ています。
jpnSearchText:
最新の模擬演習では、一艦で帝国の飛行分艦隊を
圧倒できるほどの戦力評価を得ています。

engChrName: And last—but certainly not least—I will introduce you to a new class of weaponry.
engSearchText:
And last—but certainly not least—I will introduce
you to a new class of weaponry.
jpnChrName: ──最後にサプライズとして 全く新しい兵装をご紹介しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
──最後にサプライズとして
全く新しい兵装をご紹介しましょう。

engChrName: A-Aren't those...?
engSearchText: A-Aren't those...?
jpnChrName: あ、あれは……！？
jpnSearchText: あ、あれは……！？

engChrName: Robots from the Empire?!
engSearchText: Robots from the Empire?!
jpnChrName: 帝国が使ってたっていう！？
jpnSearchText: 帝国が使ってたっていう！？

engChrName: They may remind you of the Empire's Panzer Soldats that were unleashed upon the world four years ago.
engSearchText:
They may remind you of the Empire's Panzer Soldats
that were unleashed upon the world four years ago.
jpnChrName: ご存じ、帝国が４年前に世に出した 人型有人兵器である《機甲兵》──
jpnSearchText:
ご存じ、帝国が４年前に世に出した
人型有人兵器である《機甲兵》──

engChrName: However, these weapons are far superior—and they are based on an entirely different design philosophy. We call them Assault Frames.
engSearchText:
However, these weapons are far superior—and they
are based on an entirely different design philosophy.
We call them Assault Frames.
jpnChrName: それとは全く異なる設計思想で開発された 共和国軍の次世代兵装《ＡＦ（アサルトフレーム）》です。
jpnSearchText:
それとは全く異なる設計思想で開発された
共和国軍の次世代兵装《ＡＦ（アサルトフレーム）》です。

engChrName: Their control systems utilize Xipha technology, which maximizes their performance and strengthens their output, mobility, and reaction speed.
engSearchText:
Their control systems utilize Xipha technology, which
maximizes their performance and strengthens their
output, mobility, and reaction speed.
jpnChrName: 第六世代“ザイファ”の管制システムにより 出力・操作性・反応速度全てで高性能を発揮……
jpnSearchText:
第六世代“ザイファ”の管制システムにより
出力・操作性・反応速度全てで高性能を発揮……

engChrName: Their potential is limitless. Not even the Empire's latest Panzer Soldat models can compare.
engSearchText:
Their potential is limitless. Not even the Empire's
latest Panzer Soldat models can compare.
jpnChrName: 帝国の最新式の機甲兵すら 総合的な戦力評価では上回りました。
jpnSearchText:
帝国の最新式の機甲兵すら
総合的な戦力評価では上回りました。

engChrName: It goes without saying that power must always be used responsibly. We've learned that lesson from the Empire's past transgressions.
engSearchText:
It goes without saying that power must always be
used responsibly. We've learned that lesson from the
Empire's past transgressions.
jpnChrName: ──無論、力には理性が必要です。 我々はかつての帝国ではないのですから。
jpnSearchText:
──無論、力には理性が必要です。
我々はかつての帝国ではないのですから。

engChrName: I swear to you today that we will not use our military as an unwieldy instrument of conquest and bloodshed.
engSearchText:
I swear to you today that we will not use our military
as an unwieldy instrument of conquest
and bloodshed.
jpnChrName: 鉄塊のように重々しくも巨大で、 方向転換しにくい“力”ではなく……
jpnSearchText:
鉄塊のように重々しくも巨大で、
方向転換しにくい“力”ではなく……

engChrName: Instead, it shall serve as a firm—yet flexible—tool that can respond to any situation or crises that may arise.
engSearchText:
Instead, it shall serve as a firm—yet flexible—tool
that can respond to any situation or crises that
may arise.
jpnChrName: 強くしなやかで、どんな事態にも柔軟に 対応できる“力”こそが相応しい筈です。
jpnSearchText:
強くしなやかで、どんな事態にも柔軟に
対応できる“力”こそが相応しい筈です。

engChrName: It is my belief that the weapons you have seen today will help us build a better road for our future.
engSearchText:
It is my belief that the weapons you have seen today
will help us build a better road for our future.
jpnChrName: 本日ご覧いただいた新兵装たちは それを体現していると言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
本日ご覧いただいた新兵装たちは
それを体現していると言えるでしょう。

engChrName: Thank you all for listening. I believe I have talked for long enough.
engSearchText:
Thank you all for listening. I believe I have talked for
long enough.
jpnChrName: ご静聴ありがとう── お堅い演説はここまでです。
jpnSearchText:
ご静聴ありがとう──
お堅い演説はここまでです。

engChrName: Glory to the Republic! May the Goddess bless us all!
engSearchText: Glory to the Republic! May the Goddess bless us all!
jpnChrName: 共和国に栄光と、女神の加護を！
jpnSearchText: 共和国に栄光と、女神の加護を！

engChrName: Now go out and enjoy the festival—and spend this joyous day with those you hold dear. Let us make this a celebration to remember!
engSearchText:
Now go out and enjoy the festival—and spend this
joyous day with those you hold dear. Let us make this
a celebration to remember!
jpnChrName: この佳き日を親しい人と心ゆくまで祝い、 楽しみ、また在りし日を偲んでください！
jpnSearchText:
この佳き日を親しい人と心ゆくまで祝い、
楽しみ、また在りし日を偲んでください！

engChrName: ...He's got the seventh?!
engSearchText: ...He's got the seventh?!
jpnSearchText: ！　７番目の……！

engChrName: That's one of the Geneses, right? I think I finally understand that premonition I had.
engSearchText:
That's one of the Geneses, right? I think I finally
understand that premonition I had.
jpnChrName: 例の《ゲネシス》だね。 ──ふふっ、予感はこれか。
jpnSearchText:
例の《ゲネシス》だね。
──ふふっ、予感はこれか。

engChrName: Heheh. Isn't it magnificent? Now behold, fair citizens of the capital!
engSearchText:
Heheh. Isn't it magnificent? Now behold, fair citizens
of the capital!
jpnChrName: フフッ、良い感じだ…… それじゃあとくとご覧あれ──！
jpnSearchText:
フフッ、良い感じだ……
それじゃあとくとご覧あれ──！

engChrName: You have front-row seats to the show. Dantès' desire will come about—as a banquet of fear that will engulf the world!
engSearchText:
You have front-row seats to the show. Dantès'
desire will come about—as a banquet of fear that
will engulf the world!
jpnChrName: 我らがボス・ジェラールが望んだ、首都を、 共和国を、大陸全てを“恐怖”で染め上げる宴──
jpnSearchText:
我らがボス・ジェラールが望んだ、首都を、
共和国を、大陸全てを“恐怖”で染め上げる宴──

engChrName: Witness and cower as this relic ends all things by ushering in a new dawn: Pandemonium!
engSearchText:
Witness and cower as this relic ends all things by
ushering in a new dawn: Pandemonium!
jpnChrName: 大いなる魔を、第七の遺産によって展開する、 《汎魔（パンデモニウム）化》という名の夜明けを！！
jpnSearchText:
大いなる魔を、第七の遺産によって展開する、
《汎魔（パンデモニウム）化》という名の夜明けを！！

engChrName: Oooh. I just felt a chill run down my spine! And here I was thinking Creil's destruction would be the peak.
engSearchText:
Oooh. I just felt a chill run down my spine! And here
I was thinking Creil's destruction would be the peak.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……ゾクゾクするねぇ。 クレイユからの仕込みの甲斐があったよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……ゾクゾクするねぇ。
クレイユからの仕込みの甲斐があったよ。

engChrName: Oh, my.
engSearchText: Oh, my.
jpnChrName: おっと──
jpnSearchText: おっと──

engChrName: Whoaaa! But...where did that come from?
engSearchText: Whoaaa! But...where did that come from?
jpnChrName: すっごいねー…… ……でも、これって………
jpnSearchText:
すっごいねー……
……でも、これって………

engChrName: Yumé! We're leaving right now!
engSearchText: Yumé! We're leaving right now!
jpnChrName: ユメ、いいから行きましょう！
jpnSearchText: ユメ、いいから行きましょう！

engChrName: Why are we the only ones who can move? Whatever. Follow me!
engSearchText:
Why are we the only ones who can move? Whatever.
Follow me!
jpnChrName: ど、どうして僕たちだけ…… まあいい、２人ともこっちだ！
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうして僕たちだけ……
まあいい、２人ともこっちだ！

engChrName: Wha...? Now random dudes are falling from the sky?!
engSearchText: Wha...? Now random dudes are falling from the sky?!
jpnChrName: 君、今そこから飛び降りて……！？
jpnSearchText: 君、今そこから飛び降りて……！？

engChrName: W-Well, that doesn't matter. I've got to get these two to safety, so we'll be—
engSearchText:
W-Well, that doesn't matter. I've got to get these two
to safety, so we'll be—
jpnChrName: い、いやどうでもいいか、 動けるなら君もここから──
jpnSearchText:
い、いやどうでもいいか、
動けるなら君もここから──

engChrName: Ah, yes. I remember you. Fancy meeting you here, Mister Famous Racecar Driver. It's been much too long.
engSearchText:
Ah, yes. I remember you. Fancy meeting you here,
Mister Famous Racecar Driver. It's been much
too long.
jpnChrName: たしか裏解決屋の関係者だっけ。 そっちのレーサーは久しぶりかな？
jpnSearchText:
たしか裏解決屋の関係者だっけ。
そっちのレーサーは久しぶりかな？

engChrName: Getting spotted might pose a problem. What to do...? Well, you know what they say: when in doubt, kill everyone! ㈱
engSearchText:
Getting spotted might pose a problem. What to do...?
Well, you know what they say: when in doubt,
kill everyone! ㈱
jpnChrName: 見られてもいいけど扱いが面倒だなぁ。 ……とりあえず殺ろっか㈱
jpnSearchText:
見られてもいいけど扱いが面倒だなぁ。
……とりあえず殺ろっか㈱
……！

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnSearchText: ほえ～……？

engChrName: No way! Not on my watch! I won't let you lay a finger—
engSearchText:
No way! Not on my watch! I won't let you lay a
finger—
jpnChrName: ふ、ふざけるな！ 彼女たちには指一本も──
jpnSearchText:
ふ、ふざけるな！
彼女たちには指一本も──

engChrName: (Wow, he's fast—but I'm the fastest there ever was!)
engSearchText: (Wow, he's fast—but I'm the fastest there ever was!)
jpnChrName: （こいつ本気で──！？   だが動体視力だったら……！）
jpnSearchText:
（こいつ本気で──！？
だが動体視力だったら……！）

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: ぐはっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ぐはっ……！？

engChrName: Trying to be their knight in shining armor, hmm? How chivalrous of you. Well, if you wish to die that badly...
engSearchText:
Trying to be their knight in shining armor, hmm?
How chivalrous of you. Well, if you wish to die
that badly...
jpnChrName: あはは、さすがＺ１レーサー。 なかなかの反射神経じゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、さすがＺ１レーサー。
なかなかの反射神経じゃないか。

engChrName: ...then I'll be happy to cut you up. Good night. ㈱
engSearchText: ...then I'll be happy to cut you up. Good night. ㈱
jpnChrName: でも、ジ・エンド。 せめて君から殺ってあげるよ㈱
jpnSearchText:
でも、ジ・エンド。
せめて君から殺ってあげるよ㈱

engChrName: No!
engSearchText: No!
jpnChrName: オジサンー！？
jpnSearchText: オジサンー！？

engChrName: Maxim!
engSearchText: Maxim!
jpnChrName: マクシムさんっ……！
jpnSearchText: マクシムさんっ……！

engChrName: Spare them. For now.
engSearchText: Spare them. For now.
jpnChrName: まあ、今は止めておけ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、今は止めておけ。

engChrName: Aha! ❤
engSearchText: Aha! ❤
jpnChrName: アハっ❤
jpnSearchText: アハっ❤

engChrName: We've prepared an exquisite feast of fear.
engSearchText: We've prepared an exquisite feast of fear.
jpnChrName: 恐怖を愛おしむための祝宴──
jpnSearchText: 恐怖を愛おしむための祝宴──

engChrName: Who are we to deny our ravenous guests the chance to relish it? We should let them savor their final meal.
engSearchText:
Who are we to deny our ravenous guests the chance
to relish it? We should let them savor their final meal.
jpnChrName: “資格”がある者には一人でも多く 胸を震わし、味わい尽くしてもらわんとな。
jpnSearchText:
“資格”がある者には一人でも多く
胸を震わし、味わい尽くしてもらわんとな。

engChrName: Heheh...
engSearchText: Heheh...
jpnChrName: フフフ………
jpnSearchText: フフフ………
………………………………

engChrName: He remains as unpleasant as ever.
engSearchText: He remains as unpleasant as ever.
jpnChrName: 相変わらずの悪趣味ですね。
jpnSearchText: 相変わらずの悪趣味ですね。

engChrName: Kinda bummed that the carnival's over, but hey, a festival's the next best thing. The fun's only just gotten started!
engSearchText:
Kinda bummed that the carnival's over, but hey, a
festival's the next best thing. The fun's only just
gotten started!
jpnChrName: まあ、カルナヴァルの後日祭、 適当に愉しませてもらおうかねェ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、カルナヴァルの後日祭、
適当に愉しませてもらおうかねェ。

engChrName: Welcome back to the land of the living. I've been waiting.
engSearchText:
Welcome back to the land of the living.
I've been waiting.
jpnChrName: おかえりボス、みんな。 ──待ってたよ。
jpnSearchText:
おかえりボス、みんな。
──待ってたよ。

engChrName: Whoa...
engSearchText: Whoa...
jpnChrName: あ、あれって……
jpnSearchText: あ、あれって……

engChrName: Yeah, 'whoa' is right. Hits different when you're seeing it in person than in video.
engSearchText:
Yeah, 'whoa' is right. Hits different when you're
seeing it in person than in video.
jpnChrName: 最初の映像には ちらっとしか映ってなかったが……
jpnSearchText:
最初の映像には
ちらっとしか映ってなかったが……

engChrName: It looks to be performing some sort of vast operation.
engSearchText: It looks to be performing some sort of vast operation.
jpnChrName: “稼働”── いや“演算”を実行している……？
jpnSearchText:
“稼働”──
いや“演算”を実行している……？

engChrName: Yeah. Almost like a giant computer—'cept it's a tower, of course.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Almost like a giant computer—'cept it's a
tower, of course.
jpnChrName: ああ、元凶が７番目のゲネシスを 利用して出現させた“演算装置”だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、元凶が７番目のゲネシスを
利用して出現させた“演算装置”だろう。

engChrName: And the Genesis summoned it—all for the sake of realizing Pandemonium.
engSearchText:
And the Genesis summoned it—all for the sake of
realizing Pandemonium.
jpnChrName: もちろん汎魔（パンデモニウム）化のためのな。
jpnSearchText: もちろん汎魔（パンデモニウム）化のためのな。

engChrName: Almata and its allies are likely inside.
engSearchText: Almata and its allies are likely inside.
jpnChrName: ならばアルマータの関係者たちも あの中に……
jpnSearchText:
ならばアルマータの関係者たちも
あの中に……

engChrName: Agreed. I am almost certain of that.
engSearchText: Agreed. I am almost certain of that.
jpnChrName: うむ、可能性は高かろう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、可能性は高かろう。

engChrName: Then let's get in there and kick some butt—
engSearchText: Then let's get in there and kick some butt—
jpnChrName: だったら話は早いわ！ とっとと乗り込んでケリを──
jpnSearchText:
だったら話は早いわ！
とっとと乗り込んでケリを──

engChrName: *gasp* We've got trouble, everyone!
engSearchText: *gasp* We've got trouble, everyone!
jpnChrName: ……！ 気をつけて下さい！
jpnSearchText:
……！
気をつけて下さい！

engChrName: The hell...?!
engSearchText: The hell...?!
jpnChrName: なにぃ……！？
jpnSearchText: なにぃ……！？

engChrName: Wh-What are those pillars?!
engSearchText: Wh-What are those pillars?!
jpnChrName: な、なんなのあの柱！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんなのあの柱！？

engChrName: They look to be similar in function to the demon spheres.
engSearchText:
They look to be similar in function to the
demon spheres.
jpnChrName: どうやら“魔球”に似た 構造体のようですが……！
jpnSearchText:
どうやら“魔球”に似た
構造体のようですが……！

engChrName: They must serve as a defense mechanism for the tower.
engSearchText:
They must serve as a defense mechanism for
the tower.
jpnChrName: “塔”を守る 何らかの防衛機構かもしれぬ！
jpnSearchText:
“塔”を守る
何らかの防衛機構かもしれぬ！

engChrName: Ugh... These villains have a contingency plan for everything!
engSearchText:
Ugh... These villains have a contingency plan
for everything!
jpnChrName: くっ…… 用意周到じゃないか……！
jpnSearchText:
くっ……
用意周到じゃないか……！

engChrName: Watch out!
engSearchText: Watch out!
jpnChrName: ！　気をつけろ──！
jpnSearchText: ！　気をつけろ──！

engChrName: That thing's huge!
engSearchText: That thing's huge!
jpnChrName: 巨きい……！？
jpnSearchText: 巨きい……！？

engChrName: Damn it!
engSearchText: Damn it!
jpnChrName: クソがああっ！！
jpnSearchText: クソがああっ！！

engChrName: Thank goodness I made it in time.
engSearchText: Thank goodness I made it in time.
jpnChrName: よかった──間に合ったのね。
jpnSearchText: よかった──間に合ったのね。

engChrName: Th-That was so cool...
engSearchText: Th-That was so cool...
jpnChrName: カ、カッコイイ……
jpnSearchText: カ、カッコイイ……

engChrName: No kidding.
engSearchText: No kidding.
jpnChrName: 映え過ぎでしょ……
jpnSearchText: 映え過ぎでしょ……

engChrName: Elaine!
engSearchText: Elaine!
jpnChrName: エレインさん……！
jpnSearchText: エレインさん……！

engChrName: I figured you'd be all right.
engSearchText: I figured you'd be all right.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… やっぱり無事だったかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
やっぱり無事だったかよ。

engChrName: Naturally. I knew you all would be fine as well.
engSearchText: Naturally. I knew you all would be fine as well.
jpnChrName: ええ、あなた達こそ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、あなた達こそ。

engChrName: I received a message from Zin apprising me of the situation.
engSearchText:
I received a message from Zin apprising me of
the situation.
jpnChrName: ──状況は先ほど ジンさんからのメールで把握したわ。
jpnSearchText:
──状況は先ほど
ジンさんからのメールで把握したわ。

engChrName: It looks like he sent it during the brief window when the barrier had dissipated.
engSearchText:
It looks like he sent it during the brief window when
the barrier had dissipated.
jpnChrName: 《結界》破壊の一瞬の隙に 送信してくれたみたいでね。
jpnSearchText:
《結界》破壊の一瞬の隙に
送信してくれたみたいでね。

engChrName: For real?!
engSearchText: For real?!
jpnChrName: あのタイミングでかよ……！？
jpnSearchText: あのタイミングでかよ……！？

engChrName: A feat worthy of a future S-rank bracer.
engSearchText: A feat worthy of a future S-rank bracer.
jpnChrName: フフ、流石は“準Ｓ級”か。
jpnSearchText: フフ、流石は“準Ｓ級”か。

engSearchText:
I've been looking for answers here for a while now,
and there is no doubt in my mind that the tower is
the source of our problems.

jpnSearchText:
──しばらく様子を探ってみたけど
あの《塔》が元凶なのは間違いないわ。

engChrName: However, it's being protected by multiple layers of barriers that are generated by those pillars.
engSearchText:
However, it's being protected by multiple layers of
barriers that are generated by those pillars.

jpnSearchText:
ただ、周囲の“魔柱”に守られて
幾重もの障壁が張られているみたい。

engChrName: We will have to destroy them if we wish to get inside.
engSearchText: We will have to destroy them if we wish to get inside.

jpnSearchText:
《塔》本体に辿り着くためには
全てを破壊する必要があるでしょう。

engChrName: You learned all of that on your own? Wow!
engSearchText: You learned all of that on your own? Wow!
jpnChrName: そこまで調べて くれたんですか……！
jpnSearchText:
そこまで調べて
くれたんですか……！

engChrName: I take it you made use of investigative shards to research that information?
engSearchText:
I take it you made use of investigative shards to
research that information?
jpnChrName: ふふ、シャードを利用した 探査をして頂いたようですね？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、シャードを利用した
探査をして頂いたようですね？

engChrName: That's right. Thank you for recommending those to me, by the way. They certainly come in handy.
engSearchText:
That's right. Thank you for recommending those to
me, by the way. They certainly come in handy.
jpnChrName: ええ、貴女から勧めてもらった 探査系シャードでね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、貴女から勧めてもらった
探査系シャードでね。

engSearchText:
Though I wasn't able to use them to see inside the
tower itself.

jpnSearchText:
ただ──あの《塔》だけは
内部の流れが見通せなくて……

engChrName: I wonder if there's a condition we need to meet in order to access it.
engSearchText:
I wonder if there's a condition we need to meet in
order to access it.

jpnSearchText:
ひょっとしたら“条件”が揃わないと
中に入れないかもしれない。

engSearchText: Wouldn't surprise me.
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: But don't worry about it. As long as Agnès and I are here, we'll find our way in.
engSearchText:
But don't worry about it. As long as Agnès and I are
here, we'll find our way in.

jpnSearchText:
──大丈夫だ。
俺とアニエスがいれば行けんだろ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: ...I see.
engSearchText: ...I see.
jpnSearchText: ………そう。

engChrName: Then allow me to see you safely to your destination.
engSearchText: Then allow me to see you safely to your destination.
jpnChrName: だったら私はギルドの“Ａ級”として 貴方たち裏解決屋を送り届けるだけだわ。
jpnSearchText:
だったら私はギルドの“Ａ級”として
貴方たち裏解決屋を送り届けるだけだわ。

engSearchText: With me, everyone!

jpnSearchText:
行くわよヴァン──
アニエスさんにみんなも！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: おお……！
jpnSearchText: おお……！

engChrName: We're counting on you!
engSearchText: We're counting on you!
jpnChrName: よろしくお願いします！
jpnSearchText: よろしくお願いします！

engChrName: We couldn't ask for a more dependable guide!
engSearchText: We couldn't ask for a more dependable guide!
jpnChrName: 頼もしい限りですっ！
jpnSearchText: 頼もしい限りですっ！

engChrName: Aaargh! She just stole the lead role. And I thought I was the thief!
engSearchText:
Aaargh! She just stole the lead role. And I thought I
was the thief!

jpnSearchText:
ああもう……
イイとこを持っていくわね貴女！

engChrName: Okay, then. Let's go pulverize some pillars!
engSearchText: Okay, then. Let's go pulverize some pillars!

jpnSearchText:
ハッ──そんじゃあまずは
周りの柱をブチ壊す所からか！

engChrName: I expect them to be stronger than the demon spheres.
engSearchText: I expect them to be stronger than the demon spheres.

jpnSearchText:
おそらく“魔球”以上の
脅威度でしょう……！

engSearchText:
You're right, but they don't seem to have separate
spaces inside them.

jpnSearchText:
うん──でも見た限り
内部空間とかは無さそうだね！

engSearchText:
I doubt it will be that difficult to take them
down, then.

jpnSearchText:
ならば一点突破で
砕き散らすのみであろう！

engSearchText: Good. Then let's do this, guys!

行くぜ──
アークライド解決事務所！

engChrName: Right! / All right! / Okay! / Very well!
engSearchText: Right! / All right! / Okay! / Very well!
jpnChrName: おおっ！／はいっ！／うんっ！／ええっ！
jpnSearchText: おおっ！／はいっ！／うんっ！／ええっ！

engSearchText: What?!

engSearchText: Th-They've been enhanced?!

jpnSearchText: きょ、強化された！？

engSearchText: This must be the seventh Genesis at work!

jpnSearchText:
っ……多分７番目の
ゲネシスからの力です……！

engSearchText:
They have at least three times the spiritual
energy now!

jpnSearchText:
柱からの霊圧──
２倍、いえ３倍以上に増大！

engSearchText: Gah... Only one left to go! Let's take it down!

jpnSearchText:
ッ……残るは１本だ！
このまま一気にブチ壊すぞ！

engChrName: Right. Allow me!
engSearchText: Right. Allow me!
jpnChrName: ええ──私が何とかしてみせる！
jpnSearchText: ええ──私が何とかしてみせる！

engChrName: Y-You've got to be joking...
engSearchText: Y-You've got to be joking...
jpnChrName: じょ、冗談でしょ……！？
jpnSearchText: じょ、冗談でしょ……！？

engChrName: Grr... Fine, do your worst!
engSearchText: Grr... Fine, do your worst!
jpnChrName: クソが……！ とことんやってやらあ！
jpnSearchText:
クソが……！
とことんやってやらあ！

engSearchText:
This fight ain't goin' well, is it? Sorry for dragging
you into this mess.

jpnSearchText:
悪いな……こんな
死地に付き合わせちまって。

engSearchText:
Don't be sorry. I'm quite happy you did. I rather
enjoy being by your side.

jpnSearchText:
フフ……今更でしょう。
付き合えないより遙かにマシよ。

engChrName: Heh.
engSearchText: Heh.
jpnChrName: ！　ヘッ……
jpnSearchText: ！　ヘッ……

engChrName: Don't give up yet! It's far too soon for that.
engSearchText: Don't give up yet! It's far too soon for that.

jpnSearchText:
いや──
“死地”にはまだ早かろう！
なっ……！？

engChrName: I-It couldn't be...
engSearchText: I-It couldn't be...
jpnChrName: ま、まさか……
jpnSearchText: ま、まさか……

engChrName: Zin and Fie!
engSearchText: Zin and Fie!
jpnChrName: ジンさんにフィー！？

engChrName: The Divine Blade girl!
engSearchText: The Divine Blade girl!

jpnSearchText: 女剣聖……！？

engChrName: Rixia!
engSearchText: Rixia!
jpnChrName: リーシャ……！
jpnSearchText: リーシャ……！

engChrName: And you're here, too, Cao?!
engSearchText: And you're here, too, Cao?!
jpnChrName: ツァオ、アンタもかよ！？
jpnSearchText: ツァオ、アンタもかよ！？

engChrName: Naje!
engSearchText: Naje!
jpnChrName: ナージェさんも……！
jpnSearchText: ナージェさんも……！

engChrName: It's the two Enforcers from the society!
engSearchText: It's the two Enforcers from the society!

jpnSearchText: まさか《結社》のお二人が……

engChrName: E-Even Ikaruga's here to help?!
engSearchText: E-Even Ikaruga's here to help?!
jpnChrName: い、斑鳩の人まで……！？
jpnSearchText: い、斑鳩の人まで……！？

engChrName: Hey there, Elaine. Glad you're lookin' well.
engSearchText: Hey there, Elaine. Glad you're lookin' well.
jpnChrName: ようエレイン、無事で何よりだ！
jpnSearchText: ようエレイン、無事で何よりだ！

engChrName: We were able to force open another hole in the barrier!
engSearchText:
We were able to force open another hole in
the barrier!

jpnSearchText:
もう一回だけ
結界を破ってもらった！

Heehee. Trying to hog all the fun, huh? Well, sorry,
but I can't let you do that.

jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ズルイじゃないか！
こんな余興を独り占めなんて！

engSearchText: I will aid you as best as I'm able!
jpnChrName: 及ばずながら助太刀します！
jpnSearchText: 及ばずながら助太刀します！

We're here to back you up, everyone! We'll take out
one of these pillars for you!

jpnSearchText:
ジュディス、アークライドさんたちも
こちらで援護します！

engChrName: Heh. Let's see... Ah, yes. I think that one right there will do quite nicely.
engSearchText:
Heh. Let's see... Ah, yes. I think that one right there
will do quite nicely.

皆さん……！
ありがとうございます！

Least this mean's we've only got one to go.

jpnSearchText: ええ、一気に片付けましょう──！

engChrName: Hah. You just couldn't resist joining the hunt, could you, Walter?

Hah. You just couldn't resist joining the hunt, could
you, Walter?

jpnSearchText:
ハハ、餌に惹かれて
のこのこやってきたか、ヴァルター！

engSearchText:
Heh. Of course I couldn't. And you better back the
hell off, 'cause I call dibs on this prey!

クク、引っ込んでろやジン！

jpnChrName: 姫、拙者もお供いたす！
jpnSearchText: 姫、拙者もお供いたす！

Heehee. You got to let a girl have her space.
Just don't get in the way of me and my fun, all right?

jpnSearchText:
フフ、小言はナシにしてよ？
思う存分楽しみたいんだからさ──！

engSearchText:
You're looking tired over there, Arkride. Don't go
getting rusty on me, now.

jpnSearchText:
ハハ、アークライド。
動きが鈍ってるんじゃないか？

I was gettin' shit done!

jpnSearchText:
るせえ、こちとらあちこち
駆けずり回って来てんだっての！

engSearchText: Save the banter for later. We've got work to do!

jpnSearchText: 無駄口叩いてないで、行くよ！

This is my lucky day!

せっかくの余興だ、
存分に楽しませてもらうよ！

アンタらも毎度、
美味しい所で来るよな……！

We just happened to arrive at the right time.

今まさに追い付いた所ですよ。

jpnSearchText: 私たちにお任せを──！

engChrName: Heheh. Here we go!
engSearchText: Heheh. Here we go!

jpnSearchText:

アンタらは存分にやってくれや！

engSearchText: Wh-What the heck?!

It's like time itself was being rewound right before
our eyes...

生身じゃここまでか。

engChrName: Agnès, Elaine, step back. I'll take it from here.
engSearchText: Agnès, Elaine, step back. I'll take it from here.
jpnChrName: アニエス、エレインも。 ここまででいい──下がってろ。
jpnSearchText:
アニエス、エレインも。
ここまででいい──下がってろ。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnSearchText: な……！？

engChrName: You can't be...
engSearchText: You can't be...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、まさか──
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、まさか──

engChrName: I can't count on Mare right now, but I think I'll still be able to transform.
engSearchText:
I can't count on Mare right now, but I think I'll still
be able to transform.
jpnChrName: メアはあんな状態だが 一応、何とか引き出せる。
jpnSearchText:
メアはあんな状態だが
一応、何とか引き出せる。

engChrName: Should be totally doable with all this spiritual energy in the air.
engSearchText:
Should be totally doable with all this spiritual energy
in the air.
jpnChrName: そしてこの霊圧の高まり── まさにお誂え向きだろうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そしてこの霊圧の高まり──
まさにお誂え向きだろうぜ。
あ………

engChrName: Wh-What's that black aura?
engSearchText: Wh-What's that black aura?
jpnChrName: く、黒いオーラ……！？
jpnSearchText: く、黒いオーラ……！？

engChrName: What the hell are you doing, dude?
engSearchText: What the hell are you doing, dude?
jpnChrName: てめえ、一体何を……！
jpnSearchText: てめえ、一体何を……！

engChrName: Don't! Not while in Pandemonium!
engSearchText: Don't! Not while in Pandemonium!
jpnChrName: いかん── この汎魔化の状況では！
jpnSearchText:
いかん──
この汎魔化の状況では！

engChrName: Van! You have to stop!
engSearchText: Van! You have to stop!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、駄目です……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、駄目です……！

engChrName: Haaaaaaaaah!
engSearchText: Haaaaaaaaah!
jpnChrName: おおおおおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおおおおおおっ……！

engChrName: *sigh* Your analysis capabilities are in dire need of refining.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Your analysis capabilities are in dire need
of refining.
jpnChrName: やれやれ── まだ状況判断が甘いな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ──
まだ状況判断が甘いな。
……！

engChrName: René!
engSearchText: René!
jpnSearchText: ルネ……！？

engChrName: He's not alone, either.
engSearchText: He's not alone, either.
jpnChrName: おっと、それだけじゃないぜ？
jpnSearchText: おっと、それだけじゃないぜ？

engChrName: The Oathbreaker?!
engSearchText: The Oathbreaker?!
jpnChrName: 結社の《破戒》だと……！？
jpnSearchText: 結社の《破戒》だと……！？

engChrName: What are you doing here?
engSearchText: What are you doing here?
jpnChrName: どうして貴方まで……
jpnSearchText: どうして貴方まで……

engChrName: I would like to know the answer to that as well.
engSearchText: I would like to know the answer to that as well.
jpnChrName: やれやれ── 君の方は想定外だったな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ──
君の方は想定外だったな。

engChrName: An Assault Frame?!
engSearchText: An Assault Frame?!
jpnChrName: ＡＦ（アサルトフレーム）──！？
jpnSearchText: ＡＦ（アサルトフレーム）──！？

engChrName: Th-That sounded like...
engSearchText: Th-That sounded like...
jpnChrName: し、しかもその声は……！
jpnSearchText: し、しかもその声は……！

engChrName: D-Dad?!
engSearchText: D-Dad?!
jpnChrName: お、お父さん──！？
jpnSearchText: お、お父さん──！？

engChrName: Kincaid gave me the rundown of the situation.
engSearchText: Kincaid gave me the rundown of the situation.
jpnChrName: キンケイド君からの連絡で 状況は分かっているつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
キンケイド君からの連絡で
状況は分かっているつもりだ。

engChrName: I never intended to meddle in affairs unrelated to politics, but given the circumstances, I believe I can be forgiven this time!
engSearchText:
I never intended to meddle in affairs unrelated to
politics, but given the circumstances, I believe I can
be forgiven this time!
jpnChrName: “裏”に関わるつもりは無かったが このくらいはさせてもらおうか……！
jpnSearchText:
“裏”に関わるつもりは無かったが
このくらいはさせてもらおうか……！

engChrName: Aww. Daddy left work early to help his little girl. How sweet.
engSearchText:
Aww. Daddy left work early to help his little girl.
How sweet.
jpnChrName: いやはや、親馬鹿だねぇ。
jpnSearchText: いやはや、親馬鹿だねぇ。

engChrName: And you brought the big guns, too. I know you had experience in the army, but you piloting that thing so well might raise a few eyebrows.
engSearchText:
And you brought the big guns, too. I know you had
experience in the army, but you piloting that thing so
well might raise a few eyebrows.
jpnChrName: 従軍経験があるとは聞いたが それだけじゃあなさそうだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
従軍経験があるとは聞いたが
それだけじゃあなさそうだなァ？

engChrName: I beg to differ. It's only natural that a president is fully prepared to act on behalf of their people.
engSearchText:
I beg to differ. It's only natural that a president is fully
prepared to act on behalf of their people.
jpnChrName: 有事に動けるよう備えているだけさ。
jpnSearchText: 有事に動けるよう備えているだけさ。

engChrName: Oh, and by the way, I would thank you to remember our agreement—NOT overstep your bounds!
engSearchText:
Oh, and by the way, I would thank you to remember
our agreement—NOT overstep your bounds!
jpnChrName: 君たちこそ“協定”があるのだから あまり出しゃばり過ぎないことだ……！
jpnSearchText:
君たちこそ“協定”があるのだから
あまり出しゃばり過ぎないことだ……！

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. Will do, Mr. President!
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah. Will do, Mr. President!
jpnChrName: はいはい、了解っと！！♪
jpnSearchText: はいはい、了解っと！！♪

engChrName: Who said you two could just show up out of the blue?
engSearchText: Who said you two could just show up out of the blue?
jpnChrName: いきなり出てきて 牽制し合ってんじゃねえよ！
jpnSearchText:
いきなり出てきて
牽制し合ってんじゃねえよ！

engChrName: That goes for you, too, René!
engSearchText: That goes for you, too, René!
jpnChrName: ルネ、てめえもてめえだ！
jpnSearchText: ルネ、てめえもてめえだ！

engChrName: Heh. Now you owe me twice. But anyhow, look alive!
engSearchText: Heh. Now you owe me twice. But anyhow, look alive!
jpnChrName: フッ、貸し二つだ── それよりも備えろ！
jpnSearchText:
フッ、貸し二つだ──
それよりも備えろ！

engChrName: Van, the barrier!
engSearchText: Van, the barrier!
jpnChrName: ヴァン、障壁が……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン、障壁が……！

engChrName: Now's our chance, everyone!
engSearchText: Now's our chance, everyone!
jpnChrName: 皆の者、今だ──！
jpnSearchText: 皆の者、今だ──！

engChrName: 'Bout damn time!
engSearchText: 'Bout damn time!
jpnChrName: やっとかよ……！
jpnSearchText: やっとかよ……！

engChrName: Spiritual pressure is rising once more!
engSearchText: Spiritual pressure is rising once more!
jpnChrName: 霊圧、再び上昇……！
jpnSearchText: 霊圧、再び上昇……！

engChrName: We gotta hurry!
engSearchText: We gotta hurry!
jpnChrName: これを逃したら……！
jpnSearchText: これを逃したら……！

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: くうっ……！
jpnSearchText: くうっ……！

engChrName: Elaine!
engSearchText: Elaine!
jpnChrName: エレインさんっ！？
jpnSearchText: エレインさんっ！？

engChrName: Bah!
engSearchText: Bah!
jpnSearchText: くっ……！？

engChrName: Looks like this is as far as I can go.
engSearchText: Looks like this is as far as I can go.
jpnChrName: っ……！ 私はここまでのようね……
jpnSearchText:
っ……！
私はここまでのようね……

engChrName: Van, I won't make you promise that you'll return safely—just promise me that you'll do what you believe is right!
engSearchText:
Van, I won't make you promise that you'll return
safely—just promise me that you'll do what you
believe is right!
jpnChrName: ヴァン──無事にとは言わない、 貴方の流儀を貫いてみなさい！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン──無事にとは言わない、
貴方の流儀を貫いてみなさい！

engChrName: All I will ask is that you do your duty. You may consider this an official request from me.
engSearchText:
All I will ask is that you do your duty. You may
consider this an official request from me.
jpnChrName: 私からも依頼だ── 果たすべき役割を果たしたまえ！
jpnSearchText:
私からも依頼だ──
果たすべき役割を果たしたまえ！

engChrName: You have witnessed both sides of this country. That lets you do what no one else can!
engSearchText:
You have witnessed both sides of this country.
That lets you do what no one else can!
jpnChrName: 今の共和国の表と裏を見てきた 裏解決屋（スプリガン）としての役割を！
jpnSearchText:
今の共和国の表と裏を見てきた
裏解決屋（スプリガン）としての役割を！

engChrName: Okay. I got it, Elaine! And you don't even need to ask!
engSearchText:
Okay. I got it, Elaine! And you don't even need
to ask!
jpnChrName: っ……分かったエレイン！ 大統領（アンタ）は言われずともだ！
jpnSearchText:
っ……分かったエレイン！
大統領（アンタ）は言われずともだ！

engChrName: Dad, Elaine. We'll come back safe and sound. I swear it!
engSearchText:
Dad, Elaine. We'll come back safe and sound. I
swear it!
jpnChrName: お父さん、エレインさんも……！ 必ずみんなで戻ります──！
jpnSearchText:
お父さん、エレインさんも……！
必ずみんなで戻ります──！

engChrName: Wh-What just happened?
engSearchText: Wh-What just happened?
jpnChrName: な、なによ今の……
jpnSearchText: な、なによ今の……

engChrName: I'd like to know the same thing...
engSearchText: I'd like to know the same thing...
jpnChrName: ……今、何かあったか……？
jpnSearchText: ……今、何かあったか……？

engChrName: Wait... Is that...?
engSearchText: Wait... Is that...?
jpnChrName: あれ……もしかして……？
jpnSearchText: あれ……もしかして……？

engChrName: Mr. President?! How long have you been there?!
engSearchText: Mr. President?! How long have you been there?!
jpnChrName: 大統領！？　いつの間に……！
jpnSearchText: 大統領！？　いつの間に……！

engChrName: Haha! My apologies. This was meant to be a surprise for you all.
engSearchText:
Haha! My apologies. This was meant to be a surprise
for you all.
jpnChrName: ハハ、すまない！ ちょっとしたサプライズでね！
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、すまない！
ちょっとしたサプライズでね！

engChrName: I hope everyone is enjoying the festival! As I said before, let us make this a celebration to remember.
engSearchText:
I hope everyone is enjoying the festival! As I said
before, let us make this a celebration to remember.
jpnChrName: 記念祭万歳──！ 改めて皆さんと祝わせて欲しい！
jpnSearchText:
記念祭万歳──！
改めて皆さんと祝わせて欲しい！

engChrName: Yes, sir, Mr. President!
engSearchText: Yes, sir, Mr. President!
jpnChrName: もちろんだぜ大統領！
jpnSearchText: もちろんだぜ大統領！

engChrName: We love you, President Gramheart! Glory to Calvard!
engSearchText: We love you, President Gramheart! Glory to Calvard!
jpnChrName: グラムハート万歳！！ カルバードに栄光あれ！！
jpnSearchText:
グラムハート万歳！！
カルバードに栄光あれ！！

engChrName: I'm sorry, but I will ask that you keep your distance from the president.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, but I will ask that you keep your distance
from the president.
jpnChrName: 申しわけない……！ 安全のため距離を開けて下さい！
jpnSearchText:
申しわけない……！
安全のため距離を開けて下さい！

engChrName: Oh, thank goodness! You're all okay!
engSearchText: Oh, thank goodness! You're all okay!
jpnChrName: よかった、みんな……！
jpnSearchText: よかった、みんな……！

engChrName: You really did it... Heehee. I wish I could have been there with you all, but—
engSearchText:
You really did it... Heehee. I wish I could have been
there with you all, but—
jpnChrName: 何とかしてくれたのね……！ ふふっ、悔しいけどさすがは──
jpnSearchText:
何とかしてくれたのね……！
ふふっ、悔しいけどさすがは──

engChrName: Wait...
engSearchText: Wait...
jpnSearchText: え…………
……………………………

engChrName: ...He did it again, didn't he?
engSearchText: ...He did it again, didn't he?
jpnSearchText:
そう………
…………また………………

engChrName: That idiot... He left us behind...
engSearchText: That idiot... He left us behind...
jpnChrName: また行っちゃったのね──あの馬鹿は。
jpnSearchText: また行っちゃったのね──あの馬鹿は。

engChrName: No! He hasn't left us! Not yet!
engSearchText: No! He hasn't left us! Not yet!
jpnChrName: ……行ってません………！！
jpnSearchText: ……行ってません………！！

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: His holo settings screen!
engSearchText: His holo settings screen!
jpnChrName: ……！ ホロウの設定画面……！
jpnSearchText:
……！
ホロウの設定画面……！

engChrName: A-Are you thinking of...?
engSearchText: A-Are you thinking of...?
jpnChrName: も、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: も、もしかして……

engChrName: It's no good... It's not reacting!
engSearchText: It's no good... It's not reacting!
jpnChrName: ダメ…… ……何の反応も……
jpnSearchText:
ダメ……
……何の反応も……

engChrName: Fine, I'll do this, then!
engSearchText: Fine, I'll do this, then!
jpnChrName: だったら──！
jpnSearchText: だったら──！

engChrName: Mare! Please wake up! We need you!
engSearchText: Mare! Please wake up! We need you!
jpnChrName: お願いですメアちゃん！ どうか起きてください──！！
jpnSearchText:
お願いですメアちゃん！
どうか起きてください──！！

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!
jpnChrName: ああっ……！
jpnSearchText: ああっ……！

engChrName: Wh-What's...?!
engSearchText: Wh-What's...?!
jpnSearchText: ！？　これは──！

engChrName: Ugh. Stop yelling. I already told you that I'm awake...
engSearchText: Ugh. Stop yelling. I already told you that I'm awake...
jpnChrName: うるさいわねぇ…… 起きてるって言ってるでしょ……
jpnSearchText:
うるさいわねぇ……
起きてるって言ってるでしょ……

engChrName: Mare! You have to tell us where Van's gone! Please, we're begging you!
engSearchText:
Mare! You have to tell us where Van's gone!
Please, we're begging you!
jpnChrName: メアちゃん、お願いします！ ヴァンさんの行方を教えてください！！
jpnSearchText:
メアちゃん、お願いします！
ヴァンさんの行方を教えてください！！

engChrName: If you're here, that has to mean he's close by, right?!
engSearchText: If you're here, that has to mean he's close by, right?!
jpnChrName: メアちゃんが出てきたってことは まだ遠くに行ってないんでしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
メアちゃんが出てきたってことは
まだ遠くに行ってないんでしょう！？

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: なにッ……！？
jpnSearchText: なにッ……！？

engChrName: R-Really?!
engSearchText: R-Really?!
jpnChrName: ホ、ホントですかっ……？
jpnSearchText: ホ、ホントですかっ……？

engChrName: Th-That does make sense, actually. Van is the only one capable of calling Mare normally...
engSearchText:
Th-That does make sense, actually. Van is the only
one capable of calling Mare normally...
jpnChrName: た、確かに……ヴァンさんだけが 使用できる特別なホロウ……
jpnSearchText:
た、確かに……ヴァンさんだけが
使用できる特別なホロウ……

engChrName: All this time, she has been watching over him for some unknown reason... No, perhaps it's more accurate to say she's monitoring him.
engSearchText:
All this time, she has been watching over him for
some unknown reason... No, perhaps it's more
accurate to say she's monitoring him.
jpnChrName: しかも何らかの目的であの方を 見守って……いえ監視してきた……？
jpnSearchText:
しかも何らかの目的であの方を
見守って……いえ監視してきた……？

engChrName: So if she's still active, that means...
engSearchText: So if she's still active, that means...
jpnChrName: それが起動してるってことは……！
jpnSearchText: それが起動してるってことは……！

engChrName: ...Yes, that's correct. He's still here in this dimension.
engSearchText: ...Yes, that's correct. He's still here in this dimension.
jpnChrName: ……確かにアイツは “まだ”この次元に留まってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
……確かにアイツは
“まだ”この次元に留まってるわ。

engChrName: However, he has already made his choice.
engSearchText: However, he has already made his choice.
jpnChrName: だけどアイツは選択した。
jpnSearchText: だけどアイツは選択した。

engChrName: He decided to free himself of his restraints—or the Grendel, as you call it—and accept the power that is rightfully his.
engSearchText:
He decided to free himself of his restraints—or the
Grendel, as you call it—and accept the power that is
rightfully his.
jpnChrName: グレンデルという“拘束具”を外して 自分のものだった“力”を受け入れ──
jpnSearchText:
グレンデルという“拘束具”を外して
自分のものだった“力”を受け入れ──

engChrName: Now a world-devouring demon lord lingers inside him. He chose to seal it away within the void—and himself with it.
engSearchText:
Now a world-devouring demon lord lingers
inside him. He chose to seal it away within the
void—and himself with it.
jpnChrName: 世界を喰らう魔王としての己自身を “狭間”に封じて消え去ることに。
jpnSearchText:
世界を喰らう魔王としての己自身を
“狭間”に封じて消え去ることに。

engChrName: That bastard!
engSearchText: That bastard!
jpnChrName: 野郎、やっぱりか──！
jpnSearchText: 野郎、やっぱりか──！

engChrName: H-How could he do that?!
engSearchText: H-How could he do that?!
jpnChrName: ひ、酷いですっ……！
jpnSearchText: ひ、酷いですっ……！

engChrName: Okay. It's a promise.
engSearchText: Okay. It's a promise.
jpnChrName: ──ああ、約束する。
jpnSearchText: ──ああ、約束する。

engChrName: But I want you all to remember that we ain't heroes of justice. There's no shame in turnin' tail if things go to shit.
engSearchText:
But I want you all to remember that we ain't heroes
of justice. There's no shame in turnin' tail if things go
to shit.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは英雄じゃない──ヤバくなったら ケツまくって逃げりゃあいい。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは英雄じゃない──ヤバくなったら
ケツまくって逃げりゃあいい。

engChrName: The fate of the world's important and all, but our lives are, too. We ain't gonna throw 'em away.
engSearchText:
The fate of the world's important and all, but our lives
are, too. We ain't gonna throw 'em away.
jpnChrName: 世界の命運なんかよりも てめえの命あっての物種だからな。
jpnSearchText:
世界の命運なんかよりも
てめえの命あっての物種だからな。

engChrName: Know your limits, and don't worry about what's black or white. That's the spriggan creed, and we're gonna follow it like always.
engSearchText:
Know your limits, and don't worry about what's black
or white. That's the spriggan creed, and we're gonna
follow it like always.
jpnChrName: 白黒付けない裏解決屋（スプリガン）らしく 無理せずクールにケリを付けてやろう。
jpnSearchText:
白黒付けない裏解決屋（スプリガン）らしく
無理せずクールにケリを付けてやろう。

engChrName: And once we've returned the city to normal, life will all go back to the way it was.
engSearchText:
And once we've returned the city to normal, life will
all go back to the way it was.
jpnChrName: そして汎魔化を食い止められれば 全部が元通りになるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
そして汎魔化を食い止められれば
全部が元通りになるだろう。

engChrName: And that'll pay for all the sweets and sauna trips we could ever want!
engSearchText:
And that'll pay for all the sweets and sauna trips we
could ever want!
jpnChrName: とっとと終わらせてサウナに スイーツのフルコースと洒落込むぞ！
jpnSearchText:
とっとと終わらせてサウナに
スイーツのフルコースと洒落込むぞ！

engChrName: Every word that came out of his mouth was a lie!
engSearchText: Every word that came out of his mouth was a lie!
jpnChrName: 冗談じゃない……！ そんなの詐欺じゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
冗談じゃない……！
そんなの詐欺じゃないか！

engChrName: This is a flagrant violation of our contract. I will not stand for it!
engSearchText:
This is a flagrant violation of our contract. I will not
stand for it!
jpnChrName: ……完全に契約違反です…… 認められるものではありません……！
jpnSearchText:
……完全に契約違反です……
認められるものではありません……！

jpnChrName: まあ落ち着けって…… そうだな、お前さんにも話すだけ話してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ落ち着けって……
そうだな、お前さんにも話すだけ話してみるか。

engChrName: Mind if I borrow him for a bit, Paulette? It's for a job.
engSearchText: Mind if I borrow him for a bit, Paulette? It's for a job.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、少しばかりこいつを借りるぜ。 ちょいと依頼で用事があってな。
jpnSearchText:
悪いが、少しばかりこいつを借りるぜ。
ちょいと依頼で用事があってな。

engChrName: Oh, by all means.
engSearchText: Oh, by all means.
jpnChrName: ええ、勿論どうぞ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、勿論どうぞ。

engChrName: You've got work stuff? Okay!
engSearchText: You've got work stuff? Okay!
jpnChrName: お仕事のおはなしー？ 行ってらっしゃいー！
jpnSearchText:
お仕事のおはなしー？
行ってらっしゃいー！

engChrName: Okay, so, these guys roped me into a street race. Thought that might be up your alley, too.
engSearchText:
Okay, so, these guys roped me into a street race.
Thought that might be up your alley, too.
jpnChrName: ……っつう訳で、レースと言えば お前さんを思い浮かべた訳だが。
jpnSearchText:
……っつう訳で、レースと言えば
お前さんを思い浮かべた訳だが。

engChrName: But I know you're havin' fun with your family, and I get pros foolin' around in unsanctioned street races ain't a good look.
engSearchText:
But I know you're havin' fun with your family, and I
get pros foolin' around in unsanctioned street races
ain't a good look.
jpnChrName: 念願叶って家族で過ごせてる上に、 プロが走り屋とつるむのもなんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
念願叶って家族で過ごせてる上に、
プロが走り屋とつるむのもなんだろう。

engChrName: Bit of a shot in the dark here, but I figured I'd at least ask: that pique your interest at all?
engSearchText:
Bit of a shot in the dark here, but I figured I'd at least
ask: that pique your interest at all?
jpnChrName: あんま期待できねえかと思ったんだが…… 一応お前さんとしてはどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
あんま期待できねえかと思ったんだが……
一応お前さんとしてはどうだ？

engChrName: A street race, huh? Hmm... If I did that, I might attract the attention of some scoop-loving ink slingers...again...
engSearchText:
A street race, huh? Hmm... If I did that, I might
attract the attention of some scoop-loving ink
slingers...again...
jpnChrName: そうだな……走り屋とレースとなると、 記事にしたがる記者も現れるかもしれないが……
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……走り屋とレースとなると、
記事にしたがる記者も現れるかもしれないが……

engChrName: ...Eh. What the hey? Count me in!
engSearchText: ...Eh. What the hey? Count me in!
jpnChrName: ……決めた。 僕もそのレースに参加させてもらおう！
jpnSearchText:
……決めた。
僕もそのレースに参加させてもらおう！

engChrName: Cool! But, uhh, surprised you said yes. What about the kid?
engSearchText:
Cool! But, uhh, surprised you said yes. What about
the kid?
jpnChrName: そいつはありがたいが……またどうして？
jpnSearchText: そいつはありがたいが……またどうして？

engChrName: Heh. I thought you of all people might have guessed: I've got a score to settle with you.
engSearchText:
Heh. I thought you of all people might have guessed:
I've got a score to settle with you.
jpnChrName: はは、そんなの決まってるだろう── 君と決着をつける為だよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、そんなの決まってるだろう──
君と決着をつける為だよ。

engChrName: You beat me once, but I'm not the kinda guy to take a loss lying down.
engSearchText:
You beat me once, but I'm not the kinda guy to take a
loss lying down.
jpnChrName: あの時は結局僕の負けで終わったけど、 負けっぱなしは性に合わないからね。
jpnSearchText:
あの時は結局僕の負けで終わったけど、
負けっぱなしは性に合わないからね。

engChrName: And the reporters? Thinkin' about it, they've got bigger things to cover than me. Any journo worth their salt is gonna be at the festival.
engSearchText:
And the reporters? Thinkin' about it, they've got
bigger things to cover than me. Any journo worth
their salt is gonna be at the festival.
jpnChrName: 記者については、きっと記念祭の取材で 忙しいだろうしそこまで気が回らない事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
記者については、きっと記念祭の取材で
忙しいだろうしそこまで気が回らない事だろう。

engChrName: Besides...maybe Paulette needs a break from me, just for a little bit.
engSearchText:
Besides...maybe Paulette needs a break from me, just
for a little bit.
jpnChrName: それに……ポーレットも、ずっと僕と一緒に いては気を張って疲れるんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
それに……ポーレットも、ずっと僕と一緒に
いては気を張って疲れるんじゃないかな。

engChrName: Wouldn't hurt to give her a moment to herself.
engSearchText: Wouldn't hurt to give her a moment to herself.
jpnChrName: 少しくらいは休憩を挟んであげるのも いいかと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
少しくらいは休憩を挟んであげるのも
いいかと思ってね。

engChrName: Is that right? Heh, fine by me. You wanna go again, I'll give you another dust cloud to dine on.
engSearchText:
Is that right? Heh, fine by me. You wanna go again,
I'll give you another dust cloud to dine on.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そうかよ…… そういう事ならこっちも喜んで受けて立つぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そうかよ……
そういう事ならこっちも喜んで受けて立つぜ。

engChrName: ...Don't actually know what kind of race it is, though.
engSearchText: ...Don't actually know what kind of race it is, though.
jpnChrName: まあ、具体的にどんな形式で 勝負するかはまだ聞いてねえんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、具体的にどんな形式で
勝負するかはまだ聞いてねえんだがな。

engChrName: Well, whatever it is, I'm lookin' forward to it!
engSearchText: Well, whatever it is, I'm lookin' forward to it!
jpnChrName: それも楽しみの一つに取っておくさ。
jpnSearchText: それも楽しみの一つに取っておくさ。

engChrName: I'll head over later, and we can meet back up there.
engSearchText: I'll head over later, and we can meet back up there.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、後で車で向かうから 現地集合といこうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、後で車で向かうから
現地集合といこうじゃないか。

engChrName: You got it.
engSearchText: You got it.
jpnChrName: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に
声をかけ終わったな。

engChrName: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
engSearchText: Guess all that's left is to loop back with the racers.
jpnChrName: 次は走り屋のあいつらに 報告をしに行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
次は走り屋のあいつらに
報告をしに行くとするか。

engChrName: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
engSearchText: Well, I've hit up everyone I can think of.
jpnChrName: さてと、これで目ぼしい奴全員に 声をかけ終わったな。
jpnSearchText:
